Breakfast.Title: Scrumble Eggs with ham
Breakfast.Description: Making scrambled eggs isn’t complicated, is a quick and easy breakfast packed with protein.
Breakfast.Preparation: Heat a frying pan with olive oil. Wait a couple seconds, add the crack the eggs to the pan and stir with a spatula until the eggs start to cook. Do not let the eggs cook too much, the eggs should stay creamy and not too dry. Turn off the heat, pour the scrambled eggs to a plate or over a toasted bread slice and serve.
